name: I Spoke To God
description:
---

A short atmospheric horror game for the 2021 Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers Game Jam. Reach an abandoned facility at the depths of the ocean to figure out what happened. Just some reconnaissance mission, what could go wrong?

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to dive
  • Space to surface
  • F for flashlight
  • RMB to interact
  • E for diving pad
  • ESC for options
